comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
description: This is a 3-point graduate-level course designed to describe and discuss the procedures and instruments for data collection within different domains of second-language teaching/learning research. The process of identifying and deciding ways to collect data is one of the most difficult steps for graduate students in conducting second- or foreign-language research. Throughout this course, students will gain a clearer understanding of which data elicitation techniques may be most appropriate in a given research domain, and gain better insight into the strength and weakness of major data collection methods used in the field. The research elicitation methods covered in this course include the most frequently used research protocols used in psycholinguistic, UG-based approaches, interaction, classroom, and survey-based SLA research, as well as research in cognitive processes and strategies.
goals: Students will have a better understanding of the procedures and instruments for data collection within different domains of second-language teaching/learning research; students will also gain better insight into the strength and weakness of major data collection methods used in the field.

Students will gain a clearer understanding of which data elicitation techniques may be most appropriate in a given research domain and are better prepared for their future thesis/dissertation research.
